meaningMnemonic: We have to <kanji>examine</kanji> you during this <kanji>epidemic</kanji>... soooo, if you could come over here and just stay here for a long time, that'd be great. Yeah, it's kind of a <vocabulary>quarantine</vocabulary>, sorry about that.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
